trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] This attribute should only be used as dependency property option.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Ez az attribútum csak használandó függőség tulajdonság beállításként.

trans-unit.source: Attributes are ignored if declared on a .NET property.
The ValidationOptionAttribute is intended to be used on Meta-properties only.
trans-unit.target: A ValidationOptionAttribute használható a Meta-tulajdonságok csak olyan.

trans-unit.source: It will be ignored for instance properties.
trans-unit.target: Az objektumpéldány tulajdonságai lesz figyelembe véve.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Activity Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/974353d4-28f9-4202-890d-b36981876148) for more details.
If the ValidationOptionAttribute is not specified, the behavior defaults to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationOption?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Ha a ValidationOptionAttribute nincs megadva, a viselkedés alapértelmezett <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationOption?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationOption?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationOptionAttribute"></xref> class, with a value for <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationOptionAttribute.ValidationOption*>.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationOptionAttribute"> </xref> osztály <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationOptionAttribute.ValidationOption*>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationOptionAttribute.ValidationOption*> értékkel

trans-unit.source: The required <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationOption"></xref> enumeration value for this instance.
trans-unit.target: A szükséges <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationOption"> </xref> számbavételi érték erre a példányra.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationOption"></xref> associated with this instance.
The value of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationOption"></xref> associated with this instance.
